projects.title: REST API Service
projects.description: A comprehensive RESTful API service built with Node.js and Express, featuring JWT authentication, rate limiting, and comprehensive error handling. This service provides a robust backend infrastructure for modern web applications with scalable architecture and best practices.

projects.title: GraphQL Server
projects.description: A modern GraphQL server implementation using Apollo Server, providing flexible and efficient data querying capabilities. Features include real-time subscriptions, data loader for batch processing, and comprehensive schema design.

projects.title: Full Stack App
projects.description: A complete full-stack application built with React and Node.js, featuring user authentication, real-time updates, and responsive design. Implements modern development practices including state management, API integration, and deployment automation.
features: Responsive UI with modern design patterns
Automated testing with Jest and React Testing Library

projects.title: Microservices Architecture
projects.description: A scalable microservices architecture implementing service discovery, API gateway, and inter-service communication. Built with Docker containers and orchestrated with Kubernetes for high availability and fault tolerance.

projects.title: CI/CD Pipeline
projects.description: Automated CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions and Jenkins, implementing continuous integration, testing, and deployment workflows. Features include automated testing, code quality checks, and multi-environment deployments.

projects.title: Cloud Deployment
projects.description: Cloud-native application deployment on AWS using modern DevOps practices. Implements auto-scaling, load balancing, and monitoring solutions for production-grade applications with high availability.

projects.title: Authentication System
projects.description: A comprehensive authentication and authorization system featuring multiple authentication strategies, role-based access control, and secure session management. Implements OAuth 2.0, JWT tokens, and two-factor authentication.

projects.title: Database Design
projects.description: Advanced database design and optimization project showcasing schema design, indexing strategies, and query optimization. Implements both SQL and NoSQL databases with migration strategies and data modeling best practices.

projects.title: Serverless Functions
projects.description: Collection of serverless functions deployed on AWS Lambda, demonstrating event-driven architecture and cost-effective scaling. Includes API endpoints, scheduled tasks, and event processors with minimal infrastructure management.
